data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 1,434 believers living in Botad, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Botad, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,434 believers in Botad to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 128,965 lost friends and neighbors.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Botad, Gujarat, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Botad.
Spirit, I pray that the Gadhai people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Botad, Gujarat, India to the gospel today.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Botad, Gujarat, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary:
the county of Botad, Gujarat, India has a population of 130,400.

We estimate Botad has 1,434 people who might know Jesus, 1,582 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 127,383 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Botad to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.
